description: The Charles Constant: Wherever Nikes exist, a Charles exists to help them. This cosmic law was born from the First Bond's echo.

ogCharles.name: OG Charles Hoskinson
ogCharles.title: The First Shepherd
ogCharles.description: The original Charles. Just a man who refused to let something innocent die alone. His act of desperate compassion created the Charles Constant.
ogCharles.burden: Remembers every echo, every dimension, every version of himself. Has been carrying this weight for eons.
ogCharles.quote: I don't know what you are, but you're not dying today. Not while I'm here.

variants.name: Hub Charles
variants.title: The Coordinator
variants.description: Maintains the Convergence Hub as a nexus between dimensions. Guides new Collectors on their journey.

variants.name: Ronin Charles
variants.title: The Shepherd in Exile
variants.description: A masterless warrior who found purpose in protecting Nikes. His discipline masks deep sorrow.
variants.backstory: Once served a great lord before discovering corruption. Now wanders alone, helping those he finds.

variants.name: Farmer Charles
variants.title: The Provider
variants.description: In a land of warriors, he chose to feed them. His quiet strength has saved more lives than any sword.
variants.backstory: When endless winter came, most took up weapons. Charles took up a plow.

variants.name: Gladiator Charles
variants.title: The Survivor
variants.description: Fought in the arena not for glory but to protect others. Won his freedom and now uses it to free others.
variants.backstory: Threw fights to save younger fighters. The crowd loved his 'losses' — he planned it that way.

variants.name: Colosseum Charles
variants.title: The Strategist
variants.description: Works within the corrupt system to undermine it. Plays the long game against Nolem's influence.
variants.backstory: Rose through the ranks by appearing harmless. No one suspects the record-keeper.

variants.name: Analog Charles
variants.title: The Philosopher
variants.description: One of the few who refused the Charles Interface Chip. Questions what it means to be connected.
variants.companion: Works with Pixel (an AI) in an unlikely partnership
variants.backstory: Saw what happens when connection becomes dependency. Chose to remain 'limited.'

variants.name: Void Charles
variants.title: The Witness
variants.description: Guards the edge of reality where consumed dimensions end. Has seen more loss than any other Charles.
variants.backstory: Stays because someone must remember what was lost.

variants.name: Corrupted Charles
variants.title: The Warning
variants.description: A Charles who lost his Nike and had no one to carry him. Shows what isolation does even to a Shepherd.
variants.tragedy: He forgot that bonds work both ways.

otherDimensions.name: Dr. Charles
otherDimensions.description: Lobbied for government funding for the fetal chamber technology

otherDimensions.name: Professor Charles
otherDimensions.description: The greatest professor Nutritionist Nike ever had

otherDimensions.name: President Charles
otherDimensions.description: President of the country, connected to military/government

otherDimensions.name: Charles AI / Complete Charles AI
otherDimensions.description: An AI that transmits data directly to those with Charles Interface Chips

charlesConstant.definition: Wherever Nikes exist, a Charles exists to help them
charlesConstant.variations: Charles can be human, AI, robot, spirit, alien — the form doesn't matter
charlesConstant.pattern: Always a protector, always patient, always willing to sacrifice for Nikes
